label: Yediot Aharonot daily newspaper Chief Editor Mr. Moshe Vardi had been taken on 24/4/95 to the National Serious Crimes Squad, allegedly over commissioning wiretapping on the phone of Maariv editor Mr. Dov Yudkowski.
